content: Receiver IC-RC bluetooth ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Accessories for dust and water management > Accessories for construction vacuums- - - ### FEATURES:Features Increased efficiency – remote on/off means you can control tool dust extraction without returning to the vacuum every time Less noise – only turn on the vac when needed Versatile attachment options – secure the wireless on/off switch on the tool, your belt, a vacuum cleaner hose, etc. Upgraded cordless vacuuming – maximize battery run time due to more efficient power usage, and control backpack vacuums more comfortably while wearing them Applications Retrofit compatible vacuum cleaners for use with a remote control ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Remote controls For use with: VC 140-2-22, VC 150-10 G02, VC 150-6 G02, VC 4LX-22 T15, VC 4LX-22 T8 Product information: Replacement receiver for use with an IC-RM remote control (Item 2276240; sold separately) for switching compatible Hilti vacuum cleaners on/off Technical Data | Accessory type | Remote controls | For use with | VC 140-2-22, VC 150-10 G02, VC 150-6 G02, VC 4LX-22 T15, VC 4LX-22 T8 | Product information | Replacement receiver for use with an IC-RM remote control (Item 2276240; sold separately) for switching compatible Hilti vacuum cleaners on/off ### ITEMS- 2276139 - Receiver IC-RC bluetooth - Package Size 1 pc
